availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Evans. Father of Russell S. Evans, Martha Ann Evans, Zachary Evans, Charles T. Evans, Lucretia Evans, John R. Evans, Harriett E. Evans, and Lucy Evans. Farmer in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Farmer in Henry County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 381B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 266.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Henry County, KY, July 1863, p. 66.
"Alexander Evans (1820-1897)," Find A Grave, Memorial 88073598, accessed June 27, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/88073598.
